name: Frontier Outpost
description: A remote frontier outpost serves as a military base and trading post in dangerous territory, offering protection and supplies to travelers. The isolated location makes it vulnerable to attack, while the military presence can provide security or create tension with local populations.
atmosphere: Fortified settlement on civilization edge. Air carries leather, steel, and untamed lands adventure scent. Military drills, trading negotiations, and guard vigilance create security and tension atmosphere. Isolated location creates frontier of civilization sense. Military presence provides protection but creates authority and control atmosphere. Constant attack threat creates danger and excitement. Trading post serves as traveler and adventurer gathering place.
